snippet.title: Kick-Ass 2 The Video Game Trailer (2014)
snippet.description:
There is a new villain in the city !

Kick-Ass 2 The Video Game Trailer (2014). Release date : 2014 for PS3, Xbox 360 and PC ! Subscribe now to get the latest game trailer, gameplay teaser & cinematic video, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos with Game News Official (GameNews) ! Kick Ass 2 Game (Trailer).
